text: Disorganized Crime is a 1989 American comedy movie directed by Jim Kouf and starring Fred Gwynne, Lou Diamond Phillips, Corbin Bernsen, Rub√©n Blades, Ed O'Neill, Hoyt Axton, William Russ.
